a.title: School District Strategic Plan Available Now

div.a: School District Strategic Plan Available Now

nav.div: SAU 85 Sunapee School District » News » What's New » Corona Virus 1

img.p:
Dear Sunapee Community:
Welcome back from February vacation! I hope it was a time to rest, and to have some fun time with family and friends.
As you know, there has been increasing concern globally regarding the recent outbreak of the Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) or COVID-19. While there are no suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19 in New Hampshire, we are going to be proactive in taking appropriate steps to prepare ourselves in the event of an issue.
Please take a moment to read this letter from Superintendent Holden regarding the Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) or COVID-19.
Letter on Corona Virus_Updated.pdf

div.div: 70 Lower Main Street, Sunapee, NH 03782 | Phone 603-763-4627 | Fax 603-763-4718
